ygData.subject: Mac binary installer for 1.6.0
ygData.msgSnippet: I have just posted a binary installer for the Mac.  It will install both Cantera and numarray, and does not require the XCode Tools. It was compiled using

I have just posted a binary installer for the Mac.  It will install 
both Cantera and numarray, and does not require the XCode Tools. It was 
compiled using Panther, but may work for Tiger too.
